title: Ward's hat trick leads Sharks over Canes, 5-2
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
SAN JOSE, Calif.-Joel Ward had been given a handful of chances to complete his first hat trick as a member of the San Jose Sharks. Joe Thorn...
